text: Quick lunch at the maple business city area. It's a fast Korean food kind of place. Tried the beef bibimbap with an add on for steam egg. I would say the food is not too bad but it would really be just for quick lunch. Not like something that will blow you away. Instead it would be the coffee beside the food area that is more interesting.

Thanks for the friendly staffs :)
